headline: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) Expands Azure Collaboration with New AI, Cloud Services and Global Reach
summary: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) recently launched the Oracle Exadata Database Service on Exascale Infrastructure via Oracle Database@Azure, significantly reducing costs for customers and expanding into 14 regions. Additionally, enhancements like the new Oracle AI Agent Studio and Oracle ME aim to bolster employee engagement and productivity. These developments were announced amidst a week where the company saw a 1.03% price move. The broader market experienced a mixed performance with the Dow gaining...

headline: Autodesk in proxy fight, General Mills reports mixed Q3: Morning Buzz
summary: The major indexes were broadly higher near noon, rebounding from yesterday’s declines as investors weigh concerns about persistent inflation against hopes for a more accommodative stance from the Federal Reserve, which is slated to make a policy announcement later on Wednesday. Though the Fed is anticipated to maintain a steady hand on interest rates, market participants are awaiting news on whether the central bank maintains its outlook for two rate cuts this year. Looking to commodities, gold

headline: Softbank Is Buying Ampere Computing. Chip Maker Faces Stiff Competition.
summary: Ampere’s main investors,  Carlyle  and  Oracle  will sell their interests to Softbank as part of the deal, the Japanese tech holding company said late on Wednesday.  Ampere had filed preliminary paperwork for an initial public offering in 2022, but chose not to follow through as rising interest rates tanked stocks, souring the IPO market.

headline: Oracle Introduces AI Agent Studio
summary: Oracle CloudWorld -- Oracle today announced Oracle AI Agent Studio for Fusion Applications, a comprehensive platform for creating, extending, deploying, and managing AI agents and agent teams across the enterprise. Part of Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite, the new AI Agent Studio provides easy-to-use tools for customers and partners to create customized AI agents that address complex business needs and can help drive new levels of productivity.

raw.headline: Oracle Introduces AI Agent Studio

Part of Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite, the new AI Agent Studio provides easy-to-use tools for customers and partners to create customized AI agents that address complex business needs and can help drive new levels of productivity.

headline: AEGEAN Prioritizes Passenger Experience and Builds Loyalty with Oracle
summary: Oracle CloudWorld — AEGEAN, the Greek flag carrier, is using Oracle Fusion Cloud Customer Experience (CX) to support its mission to deliver a personalized experience and offering to every traveler. With an integrated suite of AI-powered cloud applications, AEGEAN has been able to create a strong foundation of customer data, increase customer loyalty through personalized travel offers, improve overall customer experience, and drive new business.
